author: gitter-badger
body:
### PowerShell/PowerShell now has a Chat Room on Gitter

@TravisEz13 has just created a chat room. You can visit it here: [https://gitter.im/PowerShell/PowerShell](https://gitter.im/PowerShell/PowerShell?utm_source=badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=pr-badge&content=body_link).

This pull-request adds this badge to your README.md:

[![Gitter](https://badges.gitter.im/PowerShell/PowerShell.svg)](https://gitter.im/PowerShell/PowerShell?utm_source=badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=pr-badge&utm_content=body_badge)

If my aim is a little off, please [let me know](https://github.com/gitterHQ/readme-badger/issues).

Happy chatting.

PS: [Click here](https://gitter.im/settings/badger/opt-out) if you would prefer not to receive automatic pull-requests from Gitter in future.
title: Add a Gitter chat badge to README.md
